title: Mastering the Font-end
description: Next, I plan to work on mastering the front-end. I will expand and deepen my knowledge of front-end concepts. This includes performance, security, architecture, and design.

title: Rust and WASM
description: I plan to learn Rust and Web Assembly (WASM). WASM is a powerful tool used to add performance to web apps. Learning new tools and techniques will help me gain new light on programming and be a better developer.

title: Crypto Development
description: Lastly, I plan to learn blockchain development. Crypto currencies and blockchain will be important industries in the future. I will do my part to build a more sustainable and decentralized world.
